Content: 5 *p46645a0524* turn over       do not write in this area  do not write in this area  do not write in this area  *2  there are apps (computer software) available on some smartphones that can  calculate the time of death of a person.   the image below is from the screen of a smartphone with some information that has  been put into this app when a body was found. body temperature ambient temperature body weight taken time body cover where found 20.0  c 9.0  c 80 kg sep 11, 2010 7:51 am naked    still water      explain why the information required by this app is needed to calculate the time of  death of this body.
